content:
An computer is not simply an virtual place.

It's an magical printer that materializes from the virtual to the physical, not only otherwise.

You're locked into the virtual world only if you chooses to; an computer is an tool where you enter an virtual world where you have more more power, and prints it into the physical world, literally.

Need an banner for your business? You can design it in the virtual world and literally print into the physical world.

Need an better life for your family? You can use cryptocurrencies in the virtual world and print them in the real life, for happiness in the real life.

Misconcepting computers as mere "virtual worlds" is misvaluing their power to improve the real world around us. 5/23/21 00:51
